name: Monster 2
description: It is said that one should not be disappointed in life. Life sometimes gives us back the things we desperately want. My life was exactly like that. Although I had a good house, wealth, and job, I had no girlfriend who could give me sexual comfort. But one night I felt very lucky when I found stray cat girls. After gaining their trust I had sexual pleasure with them. Grace and Lucy disliked it all at first but over time they both came closer to me. Then every morning and every evening sex play with them was no less than an adventure for me. Eventually, they started liking me and then I choose one of them as my girlfriend which made my mornings and evenings of my life the most beautiful. The times spent with Grace and Lucy have undoubtedly been the best of my life. After they joined my life my life became complete.
